name: Get Epigraf entries based on properties
description:
This preset allows you to fetch all data entries from the Epigraf Playground database based on selected properties. Start by adding a property type as your seed node (e.g., materials). Additionally, make sure to paste your Epigraf API access token into the *Access token* field at the bottom of the *Generic module*. Once you are ready *Fetch Data*.

You will find your API access token within your [user profil's overview in the Epigraf web application](https://epigraf.inschriften.net/users/view/).

If you want to fetch data from a different database, you can do so by changing the database name in the *Resource path*. However, please note that you will only be able to access data from databases for which your access token has permission.

For more information on how to use the Epigraf API, please refer to the [official documentation](https://epigraf.inschriften.net/help/epiweb-api).
